answers.answer: Hi,you have been two times in the hospital now for your tachycardia.Did they tell you why you have the tachycardia and what did they do to solve it?Why do you lack faith in the blood test and in your GP? In your situation with diabetes, anorexia and tachycardia you really need someone you feel you can trust.

question: Why have I been rushed into hospital with  Tacardia for the second time and tested very high on the d dimer blood test iam diabetic and have suffered with anorexia for some years I'm 50 my heart races at the slitist thing like changing the bedding I was put on a heart monitor for 24 hours it showed very fast heart rate and shortness of breath I'm sweating so much day and night it feels iam wearing wet clothes I'm so drained and have no faith in blood test or my Gp please tell me what could be the cause
title: Tacardia
